ASUG MINNESOTA CHAPTER MEETING 2017
A right platform to learn and transform your business
Read More
A tile of well executed technology is awaiting to showcase the power of SAP towards the future at Minnesota on October 26th, 2017 with an exciting ASUG meet. As a Gold Sponsor for the event, Miracle along with its team of experts are going to take part in the event to share and explore the latest happenings of SAP.
Our technology expert Mr. Ramprasad Burugu will be there to grab the attention of the crowd, with a spectacular speaker session, that briefs about how can an organization make their SAP Ecosystem intelligent through Conversational Chat Bots. Also get a chance to see a demo of the SAP Chatbot. Take a day to learn from business leaders through presentations, discussions, and collaborative learning.
Learn More
October 26th, 2017
Minnesota
Speaker Session
Ramprasad Burugu
Practice Manager
In this digital era, the foremost thing any industry considers is customer experience. Through this session you can have a glance on how an organization can succeed in adapting a new brand of employees, partners, and customers through innovation. And get to know how to connect Conversational Bots to your SAP systems and watch an interactive demo of the SAP chat bot.
Miracle Software Systems, Inc., founded in 1994, is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, MI - USA and a national implementation and EDGE development partner of SAP since 1997. Over the past 23+ years, Miracle has helped numerous large and mid-sized businesses transition their IT to a Service Oriented Architecture with IT Transformation Initiatives and deploying SAP ERP Systems. Miracle has a global presence on four continents with multiple Global Development Centers spanning across USA, Canada and India. Today, Miracle's team includes 3000 IT Professionals.
